Task 1.description: Information-transfer task relating to factual content of a diagram, graph, table, chart, map or other visual input

common_assessment: Fully fulfils the requirements set out in the task
Appropriately addresses the task requirements
Accurately completes the task
Relevantly responds to the task
Meets minimum word count of 150 words
specific_assessment: Selects key features of the information from the visual input
Provides sufficient detail to illustrate the features
Reports information, figures and trends accurately
Compares or contrasts information by highlighting identifiable trends, principal changes or differences (rather than mechanical description)
Presents the response in an appropriate format
Focuses on factual content of diagram, graph, table, chart, map or visual input
Avoids speculative explanations outside the given data

penalties.plagiarism: Scripts may be penalised if partly or wholly plagiarised
penalties.disconnected_text: Scripts may be penalised if not written as full, connected text
